name: NextGun
description:
Next Gun

is a fast paste, 2D, top down roguelike shooter!

Shoot zombies, and other spooky monsters with a variety of fun weapons and climb the global leaderboard to the top!
Play alone or with your friends!

Controls Mouse & Keyboard:
Move: WASD
Shoot: Left Mouse Button
Aim: Mouse

Controls Controller:
Move: Left Stick
Shoot: RT / R2
Aim: Right Stick
